channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Michael Baird

item.title: Weeknotes 1
item.description: I’ve been keen to try writing weeknotes for a couple of reasons: mostly as a way to improve my written communication, but I also think I’ll enjoy a regular nudge to reflect on each week as they happen. Slack weren’t the only ones with website problems this week after a late-evening SMS told me our website at work was completely down. Initial inspection showed that our tiny Heroku set up of just 2 small dynos had been overwhelmed by traffic.
